TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit FragmentState extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>
Public Structure FragmentState Implements IEquatable(Of FragmentState)

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> 執行個體取自<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A>上<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>物件。
中的資訊<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>取得藉由剖析裝飾語音文字中合成語音的標記語言 (SSML) 當做輸入合成引擎使用的屬性。
A<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>物件可以存在於所指定的任何合成器動作要求其<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>屬性。 不過，其成員的意義可能會變更為不同的動作。 如需有關合成動作，請參閱<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>如需有關指定合成器動作。
- 規格和品質的語音輸出控制項主要是處理透過<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Prosody%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>，和 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A>
- 語音、 語言和 linguist 結構資訊是透過<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.LangId%2A>， <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>。

MemberSignature.Value: public FragmentState (System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction action, int langId, int emphasis, int duration, System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs sayAs, System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody prosody, char[] phonemes);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction action, int32 langId, int32 emphasis, int32 duration, class System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs sayAs, class System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody prosody, char[] phonemes) cil managed

public: FragmentState(System::Speech::Synthesis::TtsEngine::TtsEngineAction action, int langId, int emphasis, int duration, System::Speech::Synthesis::TtsEngine::SayAs ^ sayAs, System::Speech::Synthesis::TtsEngine::Prosody ^ prosody, cli::array <char> ^ phonemes);

new System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState : System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction * int * int * int * System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs * System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody * char[] -> System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState
MemberSignature.Usage: new System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState (action, langId, emphasis, duration, sayAs, prosody, phonemes)

Docs.param: A member of the enumeration that specifies a speech synthesis action.
The id of the language being used. Corresponds to the XML xml:lang attribute.
The emphasis to be applied to speech output or pauses.
The time allotted to speak the text of the .

A member of the class, indicating the type of text of the and the level of detail required for accurate rendering of the contained text. Corresponds to the <say-as> XML tag in the SSML specification The argument may be
A object indicating characteristics of the speech output such as pitch, speaking rate and volume. Corresponds to the <prosody> XML tag in the SSML specification

An array of objects providing the phonetic pronunciation for text contained in the , using the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) specification. Corresponds to the <phoneme> XML tag in the SSML specification. This argument may be .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 一般而言，應用程式進行直接建構<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>物件。 相反地，<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>應用程式使用的成員會建立執行個體<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis>命名空間。
如果<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>所指定的值`action`引數是<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>，所提供的值`emphasis`引數就是：
- 如果是正數，若要暫停的毫秒數的時間
- 如果負的成員<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>列舉
如果<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>所指定的值`action`引數不是<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>`emphasis`引數必須是型別<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>。
如果值`duration`引數和<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody.Duration%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>所指定物件`prosody`引數之間的差異，值上<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>物件使用。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Action As TtsEngineAction

Docs.summary: Returns the requested speech synthesizer action.
Docs.value: 的成員，表示 SSML 輸入所要求的語音合成動作。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Duration As Integer
public: property int Duration { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns the desired time for rendering a
Docs.value: 傳回 ，包含呈現 所需的時間值 (以毫秒為單位)。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Emphasis As Integer
public: property int Emphasis { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns instructions on how to emphasize a .
Docs.value: 傳回 值，表示如何強調 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 所傳回的值解譯<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>取決於<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction>所傳回的值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>屬性目前<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>。
1. 如果值<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>是 <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>
- 如果<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>是正數，傳回的值應視為無回應，以毫秒為單位的長度。
- 如果<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>是負數，傳回的值應解譯為屬於<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisBreak>。
所傳回的加強語氣資訊<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>時屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>是<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction.Silence>屬性的對應`<break>`SSML 輸入語音合成器引擎的項目。
2. 如需所有其他值的<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A>、<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>值應該解譯為<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.EmphasisWord>。
所傳回的加強語氣資訊<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Emphasis%2A>口語文字對應屬性的`<emphasis>`SSML 輸入語音合成器引擎的項目。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Phoneme As Char()
public: property cli::array <char> ^ Phoneme { cli::array <char> ^ get(); };

remarks.format:
## Remarks 所傳回的資訊<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>屬性會對應至`<phoneme>`合成引擎的 SSML 輸入的 XML 標記。
陣列`char`所傳回的物件<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A>屬性表示發音使用國際音標 (IPA)。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Prosody As Prosody

Docs.summary: Returns detailed information about the pitch, speaking rate, and volume of speech output.
Docs.value: 傳回 的有效執行個體，包含語音輸出的音調、讀出速率和音量設定，以及這些設定的變更。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的資訊<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.Prosody>對應至`<prosody>`SSML 規格中的 XML 標記

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SayAs As SayAs

Docs.summary: Returns information about the context for the generation of speech from text..
Docs.value: 如果語音合成引擎使用的 SSML 包含要用來產生語音內容的詳細資訊，則傳回 執行個體值；否則為 。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 所傳回的資訊<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>對應至`<say-as>`標記和其屬性在 SSML 規格中，而且可以指定：
- 內容類型 （例如貨幣、 日期或地址） 或所代表的語言建構<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>。
- 處理所代表的內容類型的格式設定資訊的選擇性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>，例如，日期語法。
- 若要用來產生語音功能的詳細資料<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>屬性<xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>，例如是否要明確地呈現標點符號。
